original_text: because you broke faith with me in the midst of the people of Israel at the waters of Meribah-kadesh, in the wilderness of Zin, and because you did not treat me as holy in the midst of the people of Israel.
korean_text: 이는 너희가 신 광야 가데스의 므리바 물 가에서 이스라엘 자손 중 내게 범죄하여 내 거룩함을 이스라엘 자손 중에서 나타내지 아니한 까닭이라

sentences.original_text: because you broke faith with me
in the midst of the people of Israel
and because you did not treat me as holy
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 네가 나를 거룩하게 여기지 아니하였기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: in the midst of the people of Israel
